name: inspectpack-test-fixtures
description: Test fixtures/bundles for inspectpack functional tests

scripts.install-old-lodash: cd old-lodash && yarn || npm install && cd ../
scripts.install-new-lodash: cd new-lodash && yarn || npm install && cd ../
scripts.postinstall: npm run install-new-lodash && npm run install-old-lodash
scripts.version: npm run build && git add badBundle.js
